Group

From Peragro Tempus Wiki

One of the central traditions in MMORPGs is the use of groups to take on challenges larger than individuals could alone.

Leadership

The first accepted group invitation forms the group, with the person giving the invitation becoming the leader. The leader is the only member of the group who can invite or remove new members (though any member can leave at any time) and has access to the group settings pane.

The group's maximum size is limited to the Sapience of the leader.

If the group's leader leaves, the member of the group with the highest Sapience becomes the new leader.

Group Settings

  • Split loot (auto/give to {name character}/other)
  • Invite (target/{character name})
  • Kick {character name}
  • Give leadership ({character name}/Elect leader (button, each player can choose the name of a member, the individual with the most votes becomes the new leader))

Benefits

  • Group chat channel.
  • Only group members benefit from some effects, including many created by magic or the bard skill.
